title: Russian Institute - The Best Of... (Unofficial Fan Edition)
description:
RUSSIAN INSTITUTE - The Best Of...
(an UNOFFICIAL fan production)


Description:
The Russian Institute series is set in a Russian boarding school for girls (all in their early 20s, naturally) of the nouveau rich. Lessons at the boarding school consist of one thing alone, the girls being taught the art of seduction. During the day the girls have lessons and some sneak in boys for sex sessions. However it is at night that the real fun and games take place! Before lights out the girls wonder around semi naked, some pillow fight all looking stunning, but once the lights go out they start sneaking off for their own private adventures. The entire series is a fantastically shot production filled with hot and horny sex. The girls are stunning and usually dressed in sexy little schoolgirl uniforms. This is pornography at its most lavish and sensual, it is wonderful to see such high production values, it is a real pleasure to watch. If you have not seen a Marc Dorcel production before there is no better place to start.


This fan production is a collection of the best scenes from Russian Institute Lessons 1-10. I purposely omitted Lesson 11 as it's not as good as the others. I've not attempted to join the scenes to make a cohesive story, just put together the best scenes for your viewing pleasure :)


Format: MPEG4, 640x352 29.97fps, AAC 192kbps, VBR 2-pass
Running time: 2h 51m
Scenes: 12
